name: HerbSubstitution
0:
”Alexa, open Herb Substitution”
”Alexa, ask Herb Substitution what can I use instead of mint?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: herb substitution
des: Ran out on a herb required by the recipe? No problems! Use Alexa to find out what you can substitute it with by simply asking Alexa.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
